document_data.name: Komira
document_data.mainbody:
'''Komira''' was a [[tiefling]] woman who lived in [[Elturel]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. She along with others of her kind were exiled from the city following its [[The Descent|Descent]] into the [[Nine Hells]].

{{Quote|Argh. Let me through, ''mragreshem'' or I'll rip your damned throat out.|Komira, while trying to save her daughter.}}
document_data.Description: She had purple skin, and light orange-red hair.
document_data.Possessions: Komira had a [[Komira's locket|unique amulet]] that was capable of producing ''[[dancing lights|floating motes of light]]''.
document_data.Relationships: She and her partner [[Locke]] had a child together, a girl named [[Arabella]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the Elturian tieflings were outcast and forced to live as refugees across the [[Sword Coast]]. Fortunately, they found temporary refuge at the [[Emerald Grove]] druidic enclave for a time. The feeling of security the grove provided was short-lived however, as the newly-appointed [[archdruid]] [[Kagha]] attempted to seal away the tieflings using a [[Rite of Thorns|powerful ritual]].

While at the Emerald Grove, Komira and Locke's daughter Arabella was caught stealing the ''[[Idol of Silvanus]]'' from the grove, in an attempt to prevent the druids from casting the ritual.  She was taken by Kagha and forced to answer for her crime. Komira, Locke, and several of their friends tried to get Arabella to safety but were turned away by members of the [[Emerald Enclave]].
